bibl.title: From Houses to Tenements: Domestic Architecture in Hellenistic Alexandria.
Building Communities: House, Settlement and Society in the Aegean and Beyond. Proceedings of a Conference Held at Cardiff University, 17-21 April 2001
bibl.author: TOMLINSON, Richard A.

bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 80 (2008), Bibl. Beilage 2, p. 63.
bibl.seg: TOMLINSON Richard A., From Houses to Tenements: Domestic Architecture in Hellenistic Alexandria.

Ruth WESTGATE, Nick FISHER and James WHITLEY (Edd.), Building Communities: House, Settlement and Society in the Aegean and Beyond. Proceedings of a Conference Held at Cardiff University, 17-21 April 2001 = British School at Athens. Studies. 15 (London, 2007) pp. 307-311.
